Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Apple = Tool.Handle
Tool.Enabled = true
local myCharacter local myHumanoid local numberOfApples local screenGui local buzzer
function poison(apple, humanoid) if apple and humanoid and humanoid.Parent then if humanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= nil then if Tool:FindFirstChild("PoisonScript") and not humanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild("PoisonScript") and apple then local character = humanoid.Parent local rightArm = character:FindFirstChild("Right Arm")
if rightArm and apple then local rightWeld = Instance.new("Weld") rightWeld.Part0 = rightArm rightWeld.Part1 = apple rightWeld.Parent = rightArm rightWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0, 1.25, 0))
apple.Transparency = 0.0
if apple:FindFirstChild("BG") then apple.BG:Remove() end
apple.Parent = character apple.Name = "Apple" end
local poisonScript = Tool.PoisonScript:Clone() poisonScript.Parent = humanoid.Parent poisonScript.Disabled = false
if numberOfApples then numberOfApples.Value = numberOfApples.Value + 1 end end end end end
function checkAOE(apple) local AOE = Vector3.new(7, 7, 7) while apple do local parts = game.Workspace:FindPartsInRegion3(Region3.new(apple.Position - AOE, apple.Position + AOE), nil, 100) for i = 1, #parts do if parts[i] and parts[i].Parent then if parts[i].Parent then local humanoid = parts[i].Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then poison(apple, humanoid) return end end end end wait(1.0) end end
function onActivated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end numberOfApples = Tool:FindFirstChild("NumberOfApples")
if numberOfApples then if numberOfApples.Value <= 0 then buzzed = Tool:FindFirstChild("NoApplesBuzzer") if buzzer then buzzer:Play() end return end end
numberOfApples.Value = numberOfApples.Value - 1 Tool.Enabled = false myCharacter = Tool.Parent local myTorso = myCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not myTorso then return end local myPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(myCharacter) if not myPlayer then return end
myHumanoid = myCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then return end
local clonedApple = Apple:Clone()
bodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") bodyGyro.Name = "BG" bodyGyro.P = 10000 bodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(bodyGyro.P, bodyGyro.P, bodyGyro.P) bodyGyro.cframe = (myTorso.CFrame + (myTorso.CFrame.lookVector * 2.0)) * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, 0, 0) bodyGyro.Parent = clonedApple
clonedApple.Parent = Workspace clonedApple.CanCollide = true clonedApple.Transparency = 0.85 Apple.Transparency = 1.0
local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Value = myPlayer creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = clonedApple
wait(2.0) coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() checkAOE(clonedApple) end)) wait(2.0) Apple .Transparency = 0.0 Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() myCharacter = Tool.Parent myPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(myCharacter) myHumanoid = myCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") numberOfApples = Tool:FindFirstChild("NumberOfApples")
screenGui = Instance.new("ScreenGui") screenGui.Name = "AppleGui" if myPlayer then screenGui.Parent = myPlayer.PlayerGui end
frame = Instance.new("Frame") frame.Name = "TrapContainer" frame.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0.75, 0) frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 75, 0, 75) frame.Parent = screenGui frame.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0
image = Instance.new("ImageLabel") image.Name = "Apple" image.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=64429011" image.Parent = frame image.Size = UDim2.new(0, 75, 0, 75) image.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0
text = Instance.new("TextLabel") text.Text = numberOfApples.Value
numberOfApples.Changed:connect(function() text.Text = numberOfApples.Value end) text.Position = UDim2.new(0.75, 0, 0.75, 0) text.Size = UDim2.new(0.5, 0, 0.5, 0) text.Parent = frame text.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 text.TextColor = BrickColor.new("Bright red") text.FontSize = 7 end
function onUnequipped() Apple.Transparency = 0.0 if screenGui then screenGui:Remove() end if buzzer then buzzer:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local vCharacter = script.Parent while vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") == nil or vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") == nil do print("Waiting") wait() end
local myTorso = vCharacter.Torso local myHumanoid = vCharacter.Humanoid
local duration = 13
local eatAnim
while script:FindFirstChild("EatSound") == nil do wait() end
if script:FindFirstChild("EatAnim") and myHumanoid then eatAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(script.EatAnim) eatSound = script.EatSound if eatAnim then eatAnim:Play() end if eatSound then eatSound:Play() end wait(2.2) end
if vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Apple") then vCharacter.Apple:Remove() end
local smoke = Instance.new("Smoke") smoke.Parent = myTorso smoke.Color = Color3.new(0, 1, 0) smoke.Opacity = 0.5 smoke.RiseVelocity = 0.1
while myHumanoid and duration > 0 do myHumanoid:TakeDamage(5) myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 10.0 duration = duration - 1 wait(1.0) end
if smoke then smoke:Remove() end
myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0
wait(2.0) script:Remove()
